lemma sig_trd_spp_body_alt_Some: assumes "find_sig_reducer (map spp_of bs) v (punit.lt p) 0 = Some i" shows "sig_trd_spp_body (map spp_of bs) v (p, r) = (punit.lower (p - local.punit.monom_mult (punit.lc p / punit.lc (rep_list (bs ! i))) (punit.lt p - punit.lt (rep_list (bs ! i))) (rep_list (bs ! i))) (punit.lt p), r)" (is ?thesis1) and "sig_trd_spp_body (map spp_of bs) v (p, r) = (p - local.punit.monom_mult (punit.lc p / punit.lc (rep_list (bs ! i))) (punit.lt p - punit.lt (rep_list (bs ! i))) (rep_list (bs ! i)), r)" (is ?thesis2)
